entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 March 2023
